task.title: Search for Users
task.shortdesc: Use the Search field at the top of the page to search for site visitors by Display Name, User ID, email address, or the date they joined your Livefyre network.

step.cmd: Click Show Filter to open a panel from which listed users may be filtered.
Sort by updates to the listed User accounts: Recently Updated, Newest, or Oldest.
Narrow by Date Range to list only user accounts added during the input range.
List only Banned or Whitelisted users.
List only those accounts with the input User Tags attached.
